column5: This home is located in Lewisville, Texas which is a between Fort Worth and Dallas. It is also located near Highland Village. This home is 9 min away from the DART train that can take you anywhere in the Dallas metroplex. The home has a family friendly park located in the neighborhood. The home also has a two-car garage with remote opener. Owner lives 15 minutes away from house. Hablo espa√±ol.
